summary: Dr. Jesus A. Burbano's medical license was suspended for unprofessional conduct, professional incompetence, and habitual abuse of controlled substances, including self-prescribing benzodiazepines. After an initial one-year suspension and an order to comply with the Maryland Professional Rehabilitation Program (MPRP), he violated the MPRP agreement. This led to a show cause hearing, resulting in an additional minimum six-month extension of his license suspension.
